name: nextjs-performance-optimization-reproducibility
description: Complete reproducibility package for IEEE Access paper: Performance Optimization Strategies for Large-scale Web Applications using Next.js

scripts.test:load:all: cd tests/load && for i in {1..10}; do echo "Running k6 ramp test $i..."; k6 run k6-ramp.js --out json=results/k6-ramp/k6-run-$(printf "%03d" $i).json; done && for i in {1..10}; do echo "Running k6 spike test $i..."; k6 run k6-spike.js --out json=results/k6-spike/k6-run-$(printf "%03d" $i).json; done
scripts.test:baseline: echo "Running baseline experiments..." && echo "Note: Disable optimizations in code, then run: npm run lighthouse"
scripts.test:optimized: echo "Running optimized experiments..." && echo "Note: Enable ISR + Edge, then run: npm run lighthouse"
scripts.test:ai-enhanced: echo "Running AI-enhanced experiments..." && echo "Note: Enable prefetching, then run: npm run lighthouse"
